Changes in Pojomatic Test Utils

Version ..., released ...

  • Changed the signature of org.pojomatic.junit.PojomaticAssert.assertEqualsWithDiff() such that the message parameter appears first in order to match the style of the standard JUnit assertions. Warning: this is a backward-incompatible change.

Version 1.0, released 2010-04-25

  • Updates to handle changes to Pojomatic's differences API.

Version 1.0-RC3, released 2009-12-07

  • Initial Release.
